**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 234 2.0 Arcana measures how much you know about arcane magic and creatures. Arcana Untrained General Actions - [Recall Knowledge](/Skills.aspx?ID=24&General=true) about arcane theories; magic traditions; creatures of arcane significance (like [constructs](/Traits.aspx?ID=563), [beasts](/Traits.aspx?ID=547), and [elementals](/Traits.aspx?ID=647)); and the [Astral Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=8), Elemental Planes, and [the Netherworld](/Planes.aspx?ID=36). Arcana Trained General Actions - [Decipher Writing](/Skills.aspx?ID=20&General=true) about arcane theory. - [Identify Magic](/Skills.aspx?ID=22&General=true), particularly magic of the [arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1) tradition. - [Learn a Spell](/Skills.aspx?ID=23&General=true) from the [arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1) tradition.
